statements: SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, date, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data;
SELECT distance_traveled, date FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = 123 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(distance_traveled) AS avg_distance_traveled, route_id FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY route_id HAVING avg_distance_traveled > 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY total_fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT route_id FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE date >= '2022-06-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT date, liters FROM fuel_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT SUM(liters) AS total_liters FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE kilometers > 1000
SELECT vehicle_id, start_location, end_location FROM route_optimization WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT route_id, optimal_route_path FROM route_optimization WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002'
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT SUM(liters) AS total_liters FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_liters > 50;
SELECT route_id, vehicle_id, start_location, end_location FROM route_optimization WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
SELECT AVG(kilometers) AS avg_distance, MAX(kilometers) AS max_distance FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND kilometers > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_consumed, date FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_consumed, date FROM fuel_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes_data WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_capacity FROM vehicle_details ORDER BY fuel_capacity DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes_data WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data JOIN vehicle_details ON fuel_consumption_data.vehicle_id = vehicle_details.vehicle_id;
SELECT SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data;
SELECT date, fuel_amount, distance_traveled FROM fuel_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity > 50;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT date, fuel_amount, distance_traveled FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT SUM(fuel_amount) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_amount, date FROM FuelConsumption WHERE fuel_type = 'Petrol';
SELECT MAX(fuel_amount) AS max_fuel_amount FROM FuelConsumption;
SELECT model, manufacturer, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;

SELECT d.name AS driver_name, r.start_location, r.end_location, t.fuel_consumed FROM Driver d JOIN Trip t ON d.driver_id = t.driver_id JOIN Route r ON t.route_id = r.route_id WHERE t.fuel_consumed > 50;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT model, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT SUM(fuel_amount) AS total_fuel_consumed, SUM(distance_covered) AS total_distance_covered FROM FuelConsumption JOIN Trip ON FuelConsumption.vehicle_id = Trip.vehicle_id;
SELECT Route.route_id, Route.start_location, Route.end_location, SUM(distance_covered) AS total_distance_covered FROM Route JOIN Trip ON Route.route_id = Trip.route_id GROUP BY Route.route_id;

SELECT Driver.name, Route.start_location, Route.end_location, Trip.distance_covered FROM Driver JOIN Trip ON Driver.driver_id = Trip.driver_id JOIN Route ON Route.route_id = Trip.route_id WHERE Driver.driver_id = 1;
